sqlMap.sql: delete from LNSZLAMORTIZEPLAN where TRANDATE = :trandate and SERSEQNO = :serseqno

insert into LNSZLAMORTIZEPLAN (TRANDATE, SERSEQNO, BRC, ACCTNO, CCY, CHARGEAMT, CONTRACTAMT, RENTAMT, MONRATE, TAXRATE, TOTALAMT, AMORTIZEAMT, TOTALTAXAMT, AMORTIZETAX, LASTDATE, BEGINDATE, ENDDATE, PERIOD, AMORTIZEFORMULA, STATUS, TIMESTAMP) values (:trandate, :serseqno, :brc, :acctno, :ccy, :chargeamt, :contractamt, :rentamt, :monrate, :taxrate, :totalamt, :amortizeamt, :totaltaxamt, :amortizetax, :lastdate, :begindate, :enddate, :period, :amortizeformula, :status, current timestamp)

update LNSZLAMORTIZEPLAN set BRC = :brc, ACCTNO = :acctno, CCY = :ccy, CHARGEAMT = :chargeamt, CONTRACTAMT = :contractamt, RENTAMT = :rentamt, MONRATE = :monrate, TAXRATE = :taxrate, TOTALAMT = :totalamt, AMORTIZEAMT = :amortizeamt, TOTALTAXAMT = :totaltaxamt, AMORTIZETAX = :amortizetax, LASTDATE = :lastdate, BEGINDATE = :begindate, ENDDATE = :enddate, PERIOD = :period, AMORTIZEFORMULA = :amortizeformula, STATUS = :status, TIMESTAMP = current timestamp where TRANDATE = :trandate and SERSEQNO = :serseqno

select TRANDATE, SERSEQNO, BRC, ACCTNO, CCY, CHARGEAMT, CONTRACTAMT, RENTAMT, MONRATE, TAXRATE, TOTALAMT, AMORTIZEAMT, TOTALTAXAMT, AMORTIZETAX, LASTDATE, BEGINDATE, ENDDATE, PERIOD, AMORTIZEFORMULA, STATUS, TIMESTAMP from LNSZLAMORTIZEPLAN where TRANDATE = :trandate and SERSEQNO = :serseqno
